snippet.title: Margoq's Lair | Gameplay trailer | Steam Next Fest
snippet.description:
Wishlist today https://store.steampowered.com/app/2516550/Margoqs_Lair

Margoq's Lair is a roguelite dungeon crawler, where you can combine spells into powerful attacks. Try out the demo now.
